title: Jessie James Decker Owns So Many Barely There Bikinis, We Wouldn't Dare to Count Them
content: Jessie James Decker is famous for many reasons. She's released several chart-topping country albums; she's starred in a popular reality show alongside her husband, NFL star Eric Decker; and she has her own beauty and fashion lines. So it makes sense that she has amassed such a devoted following on her Instagram account.  A quick scroll through her feed and you will find a perfectly curated look into the life of a busy, working mom. When she's not sharing posts of her three adorable children, clips of her newest singles, or makeup tutorials with her 2.9 million followers, you will find her social media account full of snaps that exhibit her cool signature style.  While we are equal parts obsessed with the cozy loungewear and flirty dresses she often rocks, it's her swimwear drawer that we would most like to raid. From sporty one-pieces to barely there bikinis, Jessie has sported just about every style of swimwear there is, and we can't help but want every bathing suit in her collection. Read on to take a look at Jessie's enviable swim wardrobe.      Related:                                                                                                           Jessie James Deckers Beachy Home Is as Stylish as It Is Kid-Friendly                  via POPSUGAR Fashion https://ift.tt/2vAYFJ7
